diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $y$ units.
The measure of angle $BDA$ is $60$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $18$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $z$ units.
The measure of angle $BAC$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $AC$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$ and $AD$ form an angle of $60$ degrees.
The lines $AB$ and $AC$ form an angle of $45$ degrees.
